articles.author: Katy O'Donnell
articles.title: Trump’s Plan to Make Housing Affordable Is Faltering - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s bid to put home ownership in reach for more Americans is sputtering, just weeks after it launched.
articles.content:
President Donald Trumps bid to put home ownership in reach for more Americans is sputtering, just weeks after it launched. 
With voters signaling that pocketbook issues are top-of-mind ahead of the … [+215 chars]
